children.description:
I attempted to retrieve the football match scores for my last year's birthday (September 17, 2021), but it seems I received an empty response. This could mean that there were no matches on that date or an issue with fetching the data.

Next, I will try to find scores for the current date instead to see if the API is working correctly for live data.

I attempted to fetch the live scores for today's football matches, but I received another empty response. This indicates that I'm unable to retrieve any football scores currently. 

Since both attempts have failed without valid results, I will choose to restart the query process.

{"final_answer":"I couldn't retrieve the scores for the football matches played on my last year's birthday due to empty responses from the data source. Unfortunately, I'm unable to handle the query at this time.","return_type":"give_up_and_restart"}

Given the previous actions and the current state, it is clear that directly fetching live scores for today's matches did not provide any useful information. To improve the chances of success, I will try to get the scores for a specific date again, rather than relying on live scores.

I will now use the function to get the scores for the football matches played on my last year birthday.

Again, I received an empty response for the scores of the football matches played on my last year's birthday, September 17, 2021. This may imply that there were no football matches on that particular date or that the API did not retrieve the data correctly.

Since I consistently receive an empty output and my attempts to get relevant match information have failed, I need to conclude my efforts on this specific request.

I'll finish and provide the final response now.

{"final_answer":"Unfortunately, I could not retrieve any football match scores for September 17, 2021, which was my last year's birthday. It may be possible that there were no matches played on that date. If you have any further questions or need information about another date, feel free to ask!","return_type":"give_answer"}

function.name: get_scores_for_given_date_for_football_score_api
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "football_score_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "If you want to know the list of football matches for a given date and what was their scores you can use this API.
All this api needs is the date input in the format %Y-%m-%d.
Eg:- 2022-12-01"

function.name: get_football_live_scores_today_for_football_score_api
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "football_score_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get Live scores for today's football matches"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.football_score_api: Get football live scores for today be it any match The scores are divided based on the league and you can fetch the data for all the leagues This also gives you flexibility to know and find the matches and scores between teams for any other given date as well
